thread.title: Malaysia's Mahathir says he was behind Najib's travel ban

title: Malaysia's Mahathir says he was behind Najib's travel ban
text:
Malaysia's Mahathir says he was behind Najib's travel ban 7:46pm IST - 01:45
Malaysia's new prime minister, Mahathir Mohamad, said on Saturday it was he who stopped his predecessor Najib Razak from leaving the country amid reports that the government was reopening investigations into a multi-billion-dollar graft scandal at a state fund he founded. Lucy Fielder reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
